title: The resilience of constructed wetlands treating greywater: the effect of operating conditions and seasonal temperature decline
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00637B, Paper
Mayang Christy Perdana, Adam Sochacki, Fatma Öykü Çömez, Adrián M.T. Silva, Maria Elizabeth Tiritan, Katerina Berchova, Zdenek Chval, Martin Lexa, Tongxin Ren, Luke Beesley, Ana Rita Ribeiro, Jan Vymazal
The use of constructed wetlands to remove pollutants from greywater is a viable solution, but seasonal variability of microbial activity and persistence of some of the organic compounds may impact...
